title: Homemade stuffing
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '4 tablespoons diced onion', '4 tablespoons chopped celery', '4 tablespoons chopped spring onion', '1 pear, cored and diced', '350g dry plain stuffing mix', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '900ml chicken stock']
